area = "lakequr_under";
areaname = "Lake Qur - Underwater";
dungeon = "LakeQur";
ambience = {ra:40,rb:0,ga:80,gb:0,ba:100,bb:0,aa:100,ab:0};
A_sprites = [{name:"Shaft of Light",model:"examine",x:27,y:27,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_lakeQur"},{name:"WaterTemple",model:"DOOR2",x:3,y:8,lock:(GameData.CHAPTER >= 3?null:"magic"),dest:["lakequr_toTemple",14,38]},{name:"Cave",model:"area_transition",x:19,y:2,dest:["lakequr_cave",4,57]}];
if(GameData.CHAPTER < 3)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"WALK_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:5,y:23,triggers:-1,ExecuteScript:function()
   {
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",2,0],["UNFREEZE"],["TALK","c_A_Emela","PC"]],"PC",true);
   }});
}
else
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Dead Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:13,y:11,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:8,conv:"c_GdM_Moric"},{name:"Dead Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:13,y:8,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:8,conv:"c_GdM_Moric"},{name:"Dead Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:21,y:12,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:8,conv:"c_GdM_Moric"},{name:"Dead Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:28,y:22,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:8,conv:"c_GdM_Moric"},{name:"Dead Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:17,y:27,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:8,conv:"c_GdM_Moric"},{name:"Dead Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:16,y:19,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:8,conv:"c_GdM_Moric"},{name:"Dead Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:27,y:13,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:8,conv:"c_GdM_Moric"},{name:"Dead Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:21,y:20,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:8,conv:"c_GdM_Moric"});
}
